currentRound.description: The current round for the game (0-indexed, 0 is round 1, 4 is round 5).

cpGrantedForRounds.description: Array of rounds (0-indexed) for which CP has already been granted to prevent duplicate CP gains.

challenger.description: The player who is the challenger for the current round, or null if no challenger.

challengerHistory.description: Array tracking which player was the challenger for each round (0-indexed). null means no challenger for that round.

available.description: List of challenger cards still available to be drawn.

used.description: List of challenger cards that have been drawn with their round and player.

currentCard.description: The challenger card currently drawn for this round, or null if none.

timerTargetTime.description: Target time for the countdown timer in 24-hour format (HH:MM), or null if not set.

deployment.description: The deployment type for the current game.

mission.description: The mission type for the current game.
